attributes.action: To change many of the current MPs to attain the Brexit 17.4M voted for.
attributes.additional_details: Very many of current MPs are thwarting the democratic decision of the Electorate in the guise of upholding Parliamentary Sovereignty.  It is obvious their aim is to keep the United Kingdom in the EU and has nothing to do with with democracy or sovereignty.  It is our wish these Traitorous Politicians be forced to seek re-election so the Sovereign People of this United Kingdom can reaffirm their decision to leave ALL of the European Union, or not. We want a General Election Now!
attributes.background: As a majority of current MPs are currently attempting to thwart the wishes of the majority of the Electorate, (against their manifestos at the last General Election), a General Election must be called immediately so a fresh Parliament of the People can be formed.
